title: Drawing, "End Table with Fish Bowl"
medium: Graphite, green color pencil, and orange color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Small stamp in red ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in lower right corner: SCALE 1"=1'0"/#6080 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil in lower right corner: P. Inscribed in graphite with dimensions throughout.
description: Drawing of a circular table with cylindrical fish bowl on surface. Circular table top of glass, supported by columnar base and four tubular metal (?) legs. Fish bowl at center of table.
